timezoneInfo: Your timezone has been successfully changed
successPersonalInformation: Your personal information has been successfully changed
firstNameError: First name must be at least 3 characters long
lastNameError: Last name must be at least 3 characters long
removeAccountBody: After removing your account you will lose access to your server, website, blacklist, and log file monitors and to all historical data.
removeAccountAnnotationTitle: All you data will be removed
removeAccountAnnotationContent: After you remove the account your plan subscription will also be removed. Be aware, account removal is final. There will be no way to restore your account.
enterPasswordConfirmRemove: Enter the password to confirm the removal of the account
consentHeadline: Receive 360 Monitoring updates and commercial communication
consentBody: WebPros group companies may store and process the data I provide to deliver personalized marketing content such as newsletters and individual offers according to the Privacy Policy. Tailored offerings may be based on additional information like usage and behavior data (Profiling). I can revoke this consent at any time in the platform preferences.
consentSuccess: Your agreement has been successfully changed
consentRevoke: You have successfully unsubscribed from our commercial communication.
successChangePassword: Your password has been successfully changed
paymentInfo: The 360 Monitoring Store operated by cleverbridge AG will process this order using the payment method attached to the selected subscription.
chargedText: Starting from {date}, you will be charged {price}/{interval} ({ie} VAT {vat}) for this product.
subscriptionChanged: Your subscription plan has been succesfully changed.
subscriptionCanceled: Your subscription plan has been succesfully canceled.
confirmNote: By submitting this order, you agree to the Terms & Conditions of cleverbridge and confirm that you have read and understood the Privacy Policy of cleverbridge and your Right of revocation as a consumer.
cancelSubscriptionText: This will stop future charges. You can keep using the license until {date} (the current billing period will not be refunded).
additionalSuccessMessage: Additional {type} monitor count has been successfully changed
currentlyNoLicense: Currently no license available. If you want you can buy a new one.
processingModification: Your order is currently being processed.
changedServersUseCount: Currently you can continue to use {count} monitors. In the next billing cycle on {date}, you will have {nextCount} server monitors.
changeWebsitesUseCount: Currently you can continue to use {count} monitors. In the next billing cycle on {date}, you will have {nextCount} website monitors.
addNewLicenses: Want additional licenses for your account?
timeOutBuy: We are still processing a previous change to your account. Please check again later to continue modifying your current subscription.
apiStatusError: Currently no information could be retrieved. Please try again later.
